scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node node_modules/pathfinder/scripts/dev.js
scripts.dev:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npx http-server ./dist -p $npm_package_config_devPort
scripts.dev:fb: npm run build:prod && firebase serve --only hosting --port=3000
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm install
scripts.reset:build: rm -rf node_modules/pathfinder && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install pathfinder
scripts.reset:clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf dist
